articles.title: China’s Ambitious Plans in Space: The Moon, Mars and Beyond - The New York Times
articles.description: An upcoming Mars landing is one of many high-profile missions on the country’s schedule as it seeks to challenge American dominance of space exploration.

articles.title: Biden calls lifting of indoor mask rule 'great day' - News24
articles.description: President Joe Biden told Americans on Thursday that the lifting of the rule on indoor mask wearing was "a great day" in the fight against Covid-19 and that they could now "smile again."
articles.content:

articles.title: CDC eases indoor mask-wearing guidance for fully vaccinated Americans - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: The new CDC guidance still calls for wearing masks in crowded indoor settings like buses, planes, hospitals, prisons and homeless shelters, but will help clear the way for reopening workplaces, schools, and other venues

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Why many Covid experts think Americans can ditch their masks soon - New Straits Times
articles.description: WASHINGTON: Covid cases are declining quickly while vaccinations continue to rise slowly but surely in the United States, the former epicenter of the pandemic.
